content:
There were 72 fighting collisions during the last day. In total, the enemy caused 8 missile and 114 aviation strikes, and made 107 shelling of rocket launchers on the positions of our troops and settlements.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces, reports the Armyinform.

  • In Kupyansk directionThe enemy of the offensive (assault) did not take action.
  • In the estuary directionOur warriors reflect 15 enemy attacks in areas of settlements of Bigorivka of Lugansk region, Grigorivka and Terny of Donetsk region.
  • In the Bakhmut directionThe forces of defense reflected 6 enemy attacks in the areas of settlements of Klischivka, Andreevka, Stupochka and the east of the time ravine of Donetsk region.
  • In the Avdiivsky directionOur defenders repelled 16 enemy attacks in the areas of settlements Berdychi, Orlovka, Tonenko, Pervomaisk and Nevelskoye Donetsk region.
  • In the Novopavlovsky directionThe forces of defense continue to restrain the enemy in the areas of Krasnogorivka, St. George, Novomikhailivka and Victory of Donetsk region, where the enemy, with the support of aviation, tried 21 times to break through the defense of our troops.
  • In the Orikhiv directionThe enemy has attacked the positions of our defenders 7 times in the areas of the robot, Staromayorsky and northwestern Verbov Zaporizhzhya region.
  • In the Kherson directionThe enemy does not give up the intention to knock out our units from the bridgeheads on the Dnieper Left Bank. So, during the day, 1 attempt to storm the positions of our troops was made.

As reportedArmyinform, last day at the front 54 of the municipalization: 11 enemy attacks were reflected in the Audiyevsky direction of the Armed Forces.
title: More than 70 combatants took place at the front: where was the hottest
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces informs about it, reports the Armyinform. In the Kupyansk direction the enemy ...
author: Army Inform
